I believe it comes from a giant tarrantula in southern antonica... not sure
of the exact location

-----Original Message-----

Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 3:26 PM

Subject: [EQCheats] Help finding Brown chitten protector

I was wondering if anyone has seen this item. I think it might come off
Terrorantula. BUT that is my thought. If anyone has heard any rumors about
where it comes from I'd be interested to know.
